attributes.action: recognise the rights of the Basque People of Spain to hold a referendum on their future, and establish links independent of central Spanish government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Euskadi ( Basque County) in Spain, has a unique culture and history, and a  Britain should support the democratic wants of the Basque people

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
